div.p: This work was financially provided by the National Natural Science Foundation of China (31770459), State Key Laboratory of Grassland Agro-Ecosystems (Lanzhou University), Youth Innovation Promotion Association CAS, Applied and Basic Research Program of Qinghai Province (2017-ZJ-761), Thousand People Plan of Qinghai Province, Construction Fund for Qinghai Key Laboratories (2017-ZJ-Y23), Qinghai Provincial Key R & D and Transformation Program (2019-SF-150). None of the authors have any competing interests in the manuscript.
